title: Got leave buster even though I finished the game.
body:
So I started the game and my nbn went down as it did for everyone in the area. Clearly not my fault, 
I didn't leave. I connected my mobile asap and got back in about 10 mins into the game. 
Why did I get leaverbuster, how is this fair. I finished the game but because a few people reported me for afk even though I got more cs, more kills than a few on my team.
I explained to them that my nbn went down and I connected to my mobile but my team harrased me, started saying I was downloading porn and to fix my net.
The stupid thing is trolls and feeders don't get reported by this community but I have my first semi afk in over 3 years, due to no fault of my own, I get leaver buster. 
Your system blows.

replies.body:
Like _Heartvine_ stated, it is unlikely that you were punished after just one leave (especially if you have been playing for 3 years). However, it is possible and especially during an AFK for ranked which is[ treated far more severely than the other modes.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2)

ISP disconnections and computer crashes do happen and Riot understand that, so punishments aren't often dished out after one leave. 

Leaver buster is an automated system and can't tell the difference between an intentional and unintentional disconnections (hence why you don't usually get punished after one leave). It does however kick in after 5mins of afk because even the shortest period of DC can make or break a game and is enough to negatively impact on the other 9 players.

 I myself received a leaver buster warning for [this game](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/129912848/200910244?tab=overview), where my client bugsplat in the last 7minutes. It also counted as a loss, and I lost my promos. While it was frustrating af, I totally understood because my absence for those last 7 minutes could have thrown the game into the other teams favour. 

Also, I just want to clear one thing up:
>if enough people report you you get leaver buster

Leaver buster system is completely automated and reports aren't factored into LB punishments. 

In saying this, the other report categories are extremely useful in catching out trolls and toxic players, so please continue to utilize them if you feel a player needs to be punished! 
If you have been punished by instant feedback report system (not leaverbuster) and feel the report was made in error, you can appeal your case through [**player support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I would say it's because of the butthurt assholes we all have to play with. There is no other reason really why, if you are true to your word, that you have had minimal leaves in 3 years that you got done.

I have left games permanently and never been done. But the minute you get shit heads playing, they will report and stuff like leaver buster that doesn't require Riot to get involved, will take place if they report you enough.
Reports don't factor into leaver buster punishments. They are two separate systems.

Thing is, it takes more than one match to get you hit by leavebuster. *Generally*, it takes 5-10 matches where you've been marked as AFK/left for you to get hit with a leavebuster punishment, depending on the frequency/consistency of the leaves. Not having AFKed/left *at all* for 3 years would mean it's practically impossible for *one* matches to warrant a leavebuster punishment, so this indicates that you've actually left matches during that time but simply don't remember the occurrences.

TLDR One match wont get you a leavebuster punishment, the match in question is simply the match that triggered the punishment.

3 years bro 3 years and yes one match does get you leaver buster. It happened to a friend I am trying to teach when his telstra net went out a few days ago, if enough people report you you get leaverbuster

Because the community reports decent players and keeps the trolls in.
On top of that, Riot have admitted that this way is the best method to "remove" the troll *cough* decentplayers *cough*. Damn, I have to get that cough looked at.
